name: Innocent Banda
bio: Zimbabwean poet, playwright, and editor Innocent Banda was born to Malawian parents. He earned a degree in education at the University of Malawi and an MA at the University of North Wales. He has taught at the University of Malawi and at Nyadire Teachers College. His radio plays include The Lean Year, first broadcast in 1969. Banda coedited the anthology Nine Malawian Plays (1976) with James Gibbs.
